content:
We are implementing PDEX PlanNet. I've downloaded JSON Definitions (zip) file from here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/downloads.html

There I found CapabilityStatement-plannet-server.json and files like SearchParameter-{resource_name}-{search_parameter_name}.json.

List of search parameters in CapabilityStatement-plannet-server.json, list of search parameters in SearchParameter-{resource_name}-{search_parameter_name}.json files and list of search parameters from https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/searchParameters.html page are different.

Which file or maybe a set of files must be a source of truth for us?

Remember that the CI build is a work-in-progress.
This is particularly true for the capability statements and the search parameters.
Neither is a source of truth at this point, and both will change in the near future. Stay tuned.
